text: <@U0N4P17ND> Apologies for the late reply, the hash is calculated on the entire java project structure sent for deployment along with the path and ctor args
And yes, about the dependency packaging it is true for dev mode and prod mode.
Thanks, also just to double check: dependencies are not included in hash, right? For example, changes into shim layer right now will not be visible in hash, if I include shim as dependency?
Yes you are right. Hash is calculated over only your project root, recursively.
